---
title: "taxa-blast"
output: github_document
---

Markdown file for working through taxonomy blast results with first _C. bairdi_ transcriptome. 

Read in file (`rsync`-ed from Mox)
```{r}
tb <- read.csv("http://owl.fish.washington.edu/scaphapoda/grace/Crab-project/1217-Cb-tax-blast.tab", sep = '\t', header = FALSE)
```

Add column names
```{r}
cnames <- c("qseqid", "sseqid", "evalue", "bitscore", "staxids", "sscinames", "scomnames", "sskingdoms")
colnames(tb) <- cnames
```
